item.title: Why Bureaucracy is Good (Sometimes): The Case for Merge Requests
item.description: A colleague of mine recently brought up a point I’ve heard before, but it still makes me think. “Merge requests feel like too much bureaucracy,” they said. We were looking at an issue that was just a quick text change on the frontend, and the thought process was, “Why do I have to create a new branch, a draft merge request, commit, and then un-draft it just for this tiny thing?”
